title: 112: Reverse Dieting with Adam
description: How do you resume eating after dieting hard so that you can fire up your metabolism and keep weight off? By reverse dieting. Now that Adam is done with his show he walks you through how he reverse diets so that he can resume normal eating habits and not balloon up.
content:encoded: How do you resume eating after dieting hard so that you can fire up your metabolism and keep weight off? By reverse dieting. Now that Adam is done with his show he walks you through how he reverse diets so that he can resume normal eating habits and not balloon up.
